headline: Marsh & McLennan (MMC) Valuation in Focus After BofA Downgrade on Growth and Insurance Rate Concerns
summary: Shares of Marsh & McLennan Companies (MMC) have been in focus after BofA Securities downgraded the stock to Underperform. The downgrade was attributed to weaker organic growth and moderating property insurance rates as primary concerns for the firm’s outlook. See our latest analysis for Marsh & McLennan Companies. Over the past year, Marsh & McLennan Companies has faced increasing volatility, with its latest one-year total shareholder return down nearly 19%. Momentum appears to be fading, as...
